content: We owe you a collective thank you. I love Dropbox, it’s probably the service that played the larger part in making my work-life easier in the last almost 10 years. Nice (and reassuring) to see it evolve like it did recently. I actually did a branding “re-design” of Dropbox a few months ago (wich turned out to be the most viewed of my Behance portfolio, by far). If you care to see it : https://www.behance.net/gallery/45717925/Dropbox
